profile.title: Boemo ba mosebelisi
profile.mustLogin: O tlameha ho kena ho bona litlhophiso.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Bontša melaetsa ea mantlha le e fetoletsoeng
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Metsotsoana pele e hlakoloa ka bohona
profile.saveError: Phoso: Ha ea khona ho boloka litlhophiso
profile.uploadAvatar: Kenya setšoantšo se secha sa boemo
profile.noPrivateKey: Ha ho senotlolo sa lekunutu sesebelisoa sena se ka se romelang.
profile.setBackupPassword: Beha phasewete ho sireletsa backup ea hau:
profile.importSuccess: Senotlolo sa lekunutu se kentsoe sesebelisoa sena.
profile.importFailed: Ho hlolehile ho kenya senotlolo (phasewete e fosahetseng kapa faele e senyehileng).
profile.keysRotated: Senotlolo se secha se entsoe mme senotlolo sa sechaba se kentsoe.
profile.importKey: Kenya backup e sirelelitsoeng ea senotlolo
profile.keyDisclaimer: Senotlolo sa hau sa lekunutu ha se tlohe sesebelisoa sena. Romela kopi e sirelelitsoeng ka phasewete ho e khutlisa sesebelisoa se seng.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fetisetsa mehala e kenang le melaetsa ho mohala kapa imeile ea hau e netefalitsoeng. Mehala/melaetsa e tsoang ho uena e ka bontša nomoro ea hau ea Chatforia.
profile.destinationPhoneForCalls: Nomoro ea moo (E.164) bakeng sa mehala

chat.selectPrompt: Khetha molaetsa kapa kamore ea puisano ho qala ho bua
